attributes.action: Reduce exam content for 2021 A level and GCSE exams
attributes.additional_details: Year 11 and year 13 students have spent 6 months teaching themselves the content. It is unfair that a third of our content is self taught and would let us down in our exams!
attributes.background: reduce content for subjects and exams in 2021 for both GCSE and A Level exams. Another alternative might be to let students choose which papers they’d like to sit , or to have topic choices in the papers

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320772
